Subject: Timezone change
Description: The Government of Mongolia is considering changing the time zone to implement daylight saving time, but no decision has been made yet. Currently, we are using the UTC+8 time zone. If the government decides to adopt daylight saving time, how should we configure the change related to the time zone? Will we handle this change ourselves, or will you be responsible for it?
What_We_Know__c: The Government of Mongolia is considering changing the time zone to implement daylight saving time and the customer wanted to know that If the government decides to adopt daylight saving time what action they need to take to align their EPP server to have the correct time.
Next_Steps__c:
This answer was provided to the customer:

"The times are automatically updated and synchronized with the NTP Server selected under "Appliance" > "Server Maintenance". When daylight saving time is implemented then the NTP server should automatically provide the correct time."
Solution_Comment__c: After the timezone change(if it will change) the NTP server will detect that and automatically will change to the appropiate timezone.
